Text.val: 26.07.2013 GB SCR18302 BAD470INIT: Removed some updates the CLNT212_TYPEOFCONTRACT (removed the task UpdateCLNT(Line 13-16))
12.03.2013 GB SCR18010 SelectCLNT: Chnaged condition of range from CDTO_DATE = PI.DATE to year(CDTO_DATE) = year(PI.DATE)
10.08.2012 GB SCR17504 BAD470P: Removed Used factoring and changed LTIF_AMOUNTH for Granted factoring
26.07.2012 SH SCR17467 BAD470P Granted factoring: Replaced CLNT403_MAXFINANCETOTAL by CDTO_MAXFINANCETOTAL
12.03.2012 SH SCR17197 BAD470L Added handling CDEP_PURPOSE = 15 (WKA)
01.02.2012 SH SCR17061 Added module BAD470P - Off balance ING RO and in BAD470Z the update of
TMPL_AMOUNTDEBITC and TMPL_CURRENCY is changed to use client values instead admin values
30.11.2011 SH SCR16933 BAD470K Added part "Save off balance risk in CMON"
07.07.2011 JH/SH SCR16520 BAD470INIT added test on admin number and made
11.05.2011 GB SCR16454 Added some changes (see SCR)
21.04.2011 JOH SCR16392 Replaced GNRL_CURRENCY by ADMN_CURRENCY
13.04.2011 GB SCR16367 Changed the display in jobjournal in the BAD470K
13.01.2011 GB SCR16140 Extended condition of selection in the BAD470R
30.12.2009 GB SCR15205 Fixed problem with correct values from
08.10.2009 GB SCR14977 Chenged condition of selection in the BAD470S and BAD470Z
04.10.2009 GB SCR14944 Extended condition for delete AllRows
10.09.209 AK SCR14872 fixed bug in SQL BAD470O
08.09.2009 GB SCR14872 Added the BAD470INIT and removed calculation for
05.09.2009 GB SCR14872 Added part Counter booking investment in the
28.08.2009 SH SCR14832 D/K Added BDC151 PI.LEVEL and PO.NIHIL_CREDITLIMIT
26.08.2009 GB SCR14849 Extended condition for calculation in the BAD470O, added
calculation for 1064 in the BAD470H, extended range for Credit investment from
1063 to 1064, changed badly implementation for Arrangements in the BAD470R,
added Ledger type 1064 (Purchase without recourse) at the end BAD470R
24.08.2009 GB SCR14759 Replaced LTIF_LEGAL_ADMNO by LTIF_VORTEX_ADMNO and
28.05.2009 SH SCR14254 BAD470R Added mising test "V.LEGALINVESTNMENT =< 0"
23.04.2009 SH SCR14254 Diff. changes in modules BAD470K/M/O/S
07.04.2009 SH SCR14254 Fixed problems with reset of helpvariables in task
"SelectCLNT" and fixed problem in BAD470K where V.GUARANTEES is calc

SQL_STMT_U.val: select CLNT101_ADMNO, CLNT102_CLNTNO, CLNT103_COMM_ADMNO, CLNT103_COMM_CLNTNO, CLNT104_LEGAL_ADMNO, CLNT104_LEGAL_CLNTNO, CLNT108_ACC_CURR, CLNT209_CONTRACT_NOTICE, CLNT906_STATUSCONTRACT, CLNT209_CONTRACT_DURATION, CLNT806_CUSTOMERTYPE, CLNT107_LIMITS_ADMNO, CLNT107_LIMITS_CLNTNO, CLNT212_TYPEOFCONTRACT, CLNT212_RECOURSEONCLIENT, CLNT104_VORTEX_ADMNO, CLNT104_VORTEX_CLNTNO, ADMN_ADMNOGLPACKAGE, ADMN_DELCREDERE, ADMN_ENDCLIENTS, ADMN_CURRENCY, ADMN_ADMNO_RATES, ADMN_TYPEGLPACKAGE from :1/CLNT, :1/ADMN where ADMN_NO = CLNT101_ADMNO and ADMN_TESTCLIENTS = 'N' and CLNT102_CLNTNO <> 99999 and CLNT102_CLNTNO<>99998 and exists (select * from :1/CDTO where CDTO_ADMNO = CLNT101_ADMNO and CDTO_CLNTNO = CLNT102_CLNTNO and year(CDTO_DATE) = :2) :3

Text.val: ... save old balance risk in CMON

SQL_STMT_U.val: DELETE FROM :1/LTIF WHERE LTIF_DATE = ':2' :3

ExpSyntax.val: Trim ({0,1})&' CLNT212_SYSTEM = 0 and exists (select * from '&Trim ({32768,9})&'/admn where admn_no = clnt101_admno and ADMN_SUPPLYCHAINFINANCE = '&ASCIIChr (39)&'Y'&ASCIIChr (39)&')'
Trim ({0,1})&' CLNT212_SYSTEM = 0 and exists (select * from '&Trim ({32768,9})&'/admn where admn_no = clnt101_admno and ADMN_STRUCTUREDCOMFIN = '&ASCIIChr (39)&'Y'&ASCIIChr (39)&')'
Trim ({0,1})&' exists (select * from '&Trim ({32768,9})&'/CCRY where CCRY308_ADMNO = CLNT101_ADMNO and CCRY308_CLNTNO = CLNT102_CLNTNO and CCRY501_DEBTORSRISK = '&ASCIIChr (39)&'Y'&ASCIIChr (39)&')'

SQL_STMT_U.val: select CLNT101_ADMNO, CLNT102_CLNTNO from :1/CLNT where :2
select CLNT101_ADMNO, CLNT102_CLNTNO from :1/CLNT where :2

Text.val: Only if V.DEBTORRISK<>0 then calculate V.GUARANTEES=sum(CDEP_ACTUALAMOUNTHELL)

SQL_STMT_U.val: select cast(sum(CMON_CURRBALINVESTMENT) as decimal (13,2)) from :1/CMON join :1/CLNT on CLNT101_ADMNO = CMON_ADMNO and CLNT102_CLNTNO = CMON_CLNTNO and CLNT107_LIMITS_ADMNO = :2 and CLNT107_LIMITS_CLNTNO = :3 where CMON_YEAR = :4 and CMON_MONTH = :5 and CMON_CURRENCY = ':6' for fetch only

select cast (sum (CDEP.CDEP_ACTUALAMOUNTHELL) as decimal (13,2)) from :1/CDEP CDEP, :1/CLNT CLNT where CDEP.CDEP_ADMNO = CLNT.CLNT101_ADMNO and CDEP.CDEP_CLNTNO = CLNT.CLNT102_CLNTNO and CLNT.CLNT107_LIMITS_ADMNO = :2 and CLNT.CLNT107_LIMITS_ADMNO = :3 and CDEP.CDEP_ADMNO = :4 and CDEP.CDEP_CLNTNO = :5 and CDEP.CDEP_TYPE in (1, 2, 6, 7) for fetch only
select cast (sum (CDEP_ACTUALAMOUNTHELL) as decimal (13,2)) from :1/CDEP where CDEP_ADMNO = :2 and CDEP_CLNTNO = :3 and CDEP_TYPE = :4 :5 for fetch only
select cast (sum (VT02_AMOUNTGNRL) as decimal (13,2)) from :1/VT02 where VT02_LEGAL_ADMNO = :2 and VT02_LEGAL_CLNTNO = :3 and VT02_DATE = ':4' and VT02_LEVEL = 'C' for fetch only
select cast (sum (VT03_AMOUNTGNRL) as decimal (13,2)) from :1/VT03 where VT03_LEGAL_ADMNO = :2 and VT03_LEGAL_CLNTNO = :3 and VT03_DATE = ':4' for fetch only
select cast (sum (LTIF_AMOUNTH) as decimal (13,2)) from :1/LTIF where LTIF_ADMNO = :2 and LTIF_CLNTNO = :3 and LTIF_DATE = ':4' and LTIF_LTYP_TYPE between :5 and :6 for fetch only

select cast (sum (CDEP_ACTUALAMOUNTHELL) as decimal (13,2)) from :1/CDEP where CDEP_ADMNO = :2 and CDEP_CLNTNO = :3 and CDEP_TYPE = 3 and CDEP_PURPOSE = :4 and CDEP_ACTUALAMOUNTHELL > 0 for fetch only

select cast(sum(CMON_AVGBALFACTACC + CMON_AVGBALSPECIALACC) as decimal (13,2)), cast(sum(CMON_AVGINVESTMENT) as decimal (13,2)) from :1/CMON join :1/CLNT on CLNT101_ADMNO = CMON_ADMNO and CLNT102_CLNTNO = CMON_CLNTNO and CLNT104_LEGAL_ADMNO = :2 and CLNT104_LEGAL_CLNTNO = :3 where CMON_YEAR = :4 and CMON_CURRENCY = ':5' for fetch only

select LTIF_VORTEX_ADMNO, LTIF_VORTEX_CLNTNO from :1/LTIF where LTIF_DATE = ':2' and LTIF_AMOUNTH <> 0 :3 group by LTIF_VORTEX_ADMNO, LTIF_VORTEX_CLNTNO order by LTIF_VORTEX_ADMNO, LTIF_VORTEX_CLNTNO for fetch only

Text.val: --- Only if V.SURPLUS > 0 then set LTIF_AMOUNTH = LTIF_AMOUNTH - V.SURPLUS
--- Repeat the steps above until V.SURPLUS =< 0
--- Only if V.SURPLUS > 0 then set LTIF_AMOUNTH = LTIF_AMOUNTH - V.SURPLUS
--- repeat the steps above until V.SURPLUS =< 0

SQL_STMT_U.val: select cast (sum (LTIF_AMOUNTH) as decimal (13,2)) from :1/LTIF where LTIF_VORTEX_ADMNO = :2 and LTIF_VORTEX_CLNTNO = :3 and LTIF_DATE = ':4' and LTIF_LTYP_TYPE between :5 and :6 :7 for fetch only

select LTIF_ADMNO, LTIF_CLNTNO, min(CLNT104_LEGAL_ADMNO), min(CLNT104_LEGAL_CLNTNO), min(CLNT212_TYPEOFCONTRACT), min(CLNT212_RECOURSEONCLIENT), min(cast (CDTO_CURRBALINVESTMENT as decimal(13,2))), min(ADMN_ADMNOGLPACKAGE), min(CLNT104_VORTEX_ADMNO), min(CLNT104_VORTEX_CLNTNO) from :1/LTIF join :1/CLNT on CLNT101_ADMNO = LTIF_ADMNO and CLNT102_CLNTNO = LTIF_CLNTNO join :1/CDTO on CDTO_ADMNO = LTIF_ADMNO and CDTO_CLNTNO = LTIF_CLNTNO and CDTO_DATE = ':2' join :1/ADMN on ADMN_NO = LTIF_ADMNO where LTIF_DATE = ':2' :3 group by LTIF_ADMNO, LTIF_CLNTNO order by LTIF_ADMNO, LTIF_CLNTNO for fetch only
select cast (sum (LTIF_AMOUNTH) as decimal (13,2)) from :1/LTIF where LTIF_ADMNO = :2 and LTIF_CLNTNO = :3 and LTIF_DATE = ':4' and LTIF_LTYP_TYPE between :5 and :6 for fetch only

select LTIF_ADMNO, LTIF_CLNTNO, LTIF_LDGR_NO, LTIF_CALCULATIONTYPE, min(ADMN_ADMNOGLPACKAGE) from :1/LTIF join :1/ADMN on ADMN_NO = LTIF_ADMNO where LTIF_DATE = ':2' :3 group by LTIF_ADMNO, LTIF_CLNTNO, LTIF_LDGR_NO, LTIF_CALCULATIONTYPE order by LTIF_ADMNO, LTIF_CLNTNO, LTIF_LDGR_NO, LTIF_CALCULATIONTYPE for fetch only
select cast (sum (LTIF_AMOUNTH) as decimal (13,2)) from :1/LTIF where LTIF_ADMNO = :2 and LTIF_CLNTNO = :3 and LTIF_LDGR_NO = :4 and LTIF_CALCULATIONTYPE = ':5' and LTIF_DATE = ':6' for fetch only
select cast (sum (LGCC_AMOUNTH) as decimal (13,2)) from :1/LGCC where LGCC_ACCC_ACCT_ADMNO = :2 and LGCC_ACCC_ACCT_CLNTNO = :3 and :4 LGCC_LDGR_NO = :5 and LGCC_LDGR_NO > 0 for fetch only
DELETE FROM :1/LTIF WHERE LTIF_DATE = ':2' and LTIF_AMOUNTH = 0
